keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Officials from the United States and its allies reviewed a drive against Islamic State-held cities, but also discussed the broader campaign against the group.

headline.print_headline: Officials Discuss Plans to Diminish ISIS’s Reach
headline.main: Military Leaders Discuss Plans to Counter ISIS Beyond the Battlefield

snippet: Officials from the United States and its allies reviewed a drive against Islamic State-held cities, but also discussed the broader campaign against the group....
abstract: Officials in United States-led coalition fighting Islamic State group meet at Joint Base Andrews in Maryland to finesse details regarding how to stabilize and operate Mosul, Iraq, and Raqqa, Syria, which are last major strongholds held by group; question of whether coalition is prevailing in larger conflict is raised, given increase in terrorist attacks by those sympathetic to group.
